text: Put any number of cards from your mana zone into your graveyard. Then draw that many cards.
flavor: "Why don't mortals embrace despair? All my ghoul friends really seem to enjoy it." -Ballom, Master of Death

name: Gigabolver
text: Players can't use the "shield trigger" abilities of light cards.
flavor: It looks like a hideous monster, but there's really a sweet little girl deep down inside. In its stomach.

name: Gregoria, Princess of War
text: Each Demon Command in the battle zone gets +2000 power and has "blocker." (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, you may tap a creature that has "blocker" to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)
flavor: Those fools in the clouds had better learn to like eternal midnight.

name: Gregorian Worm
text: Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)
flavor: To a Gregorian worm, the world falls into two categories: things it can eat, and . . . Well, so far there's just the one category.

name: Locomotiver
text:
Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)
When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.
flavor: If you think that's scary, you should see the caboose.

name: Mongrel Man
text: Whenever another creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.
flavor: "Shut off a light for a split second, and darkness rushes in to fill the void. This should be an easy war."

name: Photocide, Lord of the Wastes
text:
This creature can't attack players.
This creature can attack untapped light creatures.
flavor: "I will snuff out the sun and the stars! Then I'll move on to the candles and the lanterns. If I have time, I'll take care of those glow sticks people wear around thier necks. But the sun is first!"

name: Purple Piercer
text:
This creature can't be attacked by light creatures.
This creature can't be blocked by light creatures.
flavor: You do not want to get into a tickle fight with this thing.

name: Shadow Moon, Cursed Shade
text: Each other darkness creature in the battle zone gets +2000 power.
flavor: It spins a web of evil spells, all for its mistress, the Princess of War.

name: Skeleton Thief, the Revealer
text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a Living Dead from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: I've dug up a pelvis, five kneecaps, and a bucketful of ribs tonight. But I still can't find any hands!

name: Soul Gulp
text: Your opponent chooses and discards a card from his hand for each light creature he has in the battle zone.
flavor: The first victim of the war between light and dark was the sky.

name: Volcano Smog, Deceptive Shade
text: Each light creature costs 2 more to summon, and each light spell costs 2 more to cast.
flavor: "Is there any word more meaningless than 'hope'? Besides 'blarfurgsnarg,' of course."

name: Blasto, Explosive Soldier
text: While you have a darkness creature in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power.
flavor: "How dare you doubt me? I have called for reinforcements...from the Fire Realm." - Trox, General of Destruction

name: Chaotic Skyterror
text: Each Demon Command in the battle zone has "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker." (A creature that has "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker" gets +4000 power while attacking and breaks 2 shields.)
flavor: I taught Trox and Ballom a trick. Now they breathe fire.

name: Kamikaze, Chainsaw Warrior
text: Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)
flavor: With these chainsaws, shredding a forest is easy. But eating a steak is hard.

name: Magmarex
text:
Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)
When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have power 1000.
flavor: Is it hot in here, or is it just me? Oh . . . right.

name: Mega Detonator
text: Discard any number of cards from your hand. Then choose the same number of your creatures in the battle zone. Each of those creatures gets "double breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)
flavor: "They don't call me an arms dealer for nothing." -Engineer Pipo

name: Missile Boy
text: Each light creature costs 1 more to summon, and each light spell costs 1 more to cast.

text: Each Armored Dragon in the battle zone gets +1000 power.
flavor: When a Fire Bird senses a Dragon in trouble, the whole flock rises into the air, chirps "kuripppie," and dashes to the rescue.

name: Sword of Malevolent Death
text: Until the end of the turn, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each darkness card in your mana zone."
flavor: Ballom gives his armies haunted swords, each with a soul trapped inside.

name: Ancient Giant
text:
This creature can't be blocked by darkness creatures.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
flavor: "I don't care how hugely, massively, gigantically big it is! Stop it before it gets to General Trox!" -Zagaan, Knight of Darkness

name: Cannon Shell
text:
Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)
This creature gets +1000 power for each shield you have.
flavor: It has hungered for revenge since the Dark Lords invaded.

name: Dew Mushroom
text: Each darkness creature costs 1 more to summon, and each darkness spell costs 1 more to cast.
flavor: "The only thing grosser than eating a mushroom is having a mushroom eat me." -Giliam the Tormentor

name: Exploding Cactus
text: While you have a light creature in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power.

text: Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

flavor: "Alcadeias has given us a great gift! We're saved! We're...ummm, can anyone lift that thing?" - Fear Fang

name: Three-Eyed Dragonfly

name: Torcon
text: Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)
flavor: This ritual seeds the sky with lightning, rips infected trees up by the roots, and turns me a rockin' shade of blue.

name: Rimuel, Cloudbreak Elemental
text:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone for each untapped light card in your mana zone.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

text:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return all Angel Commands and all Demon Commands from your graveyard to your hand.
Angel Commands and Demon Commands in the battle zone each get +2000 power.

name: Ballom, Master of Death
text:
Evolution - Put on one of your Demon Commands.
When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
flavor: You see a world. I see a graveyard-to-be.

name: Galklife Dragon
text:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all light creatures that have power 4000 or less.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
flavor: Let the skies burn.

name: Niofa, Horned Protector
text:
Evolution - Put on one of your Horned Beasts.
When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a nature creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

name: La Byle, Seeker of the Winds
text:
Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)
Whenever this creature blocks, untap it after it battles.
flavor: "Breeze? Nah. Gust? Nah. Tornado? Aw, yeah."

name: King Mazelan
text:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

name: Sinister General Damudo
text: When this creature is destroyed, destroy all creatures that have power 3000 or less.

name: Bladerush Skyterror Q
text: Survivor (Each of your Survivors has this creature's Survivor ability.) : Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

name: Obsidian Scarab
text:
Power attacker +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +3000 power.)
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
When this creature is destroyed, you may put an Obsidian Scarab from your mana zone into the battle zone.

name: Ballus, Dogfight Enforcer Q
text: Survivor (Each of your Survivors has this creature's Survivor ability.) : At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature.
flavor: To indicate the telepathic link shared by all Survivors, scientists added a code letter to their names.

name: Calgo, Vizier of Rainclouds
text: This creature can't be blocked by creatures that have power 4000 or more.

name: Gallia Zohl, Iron Guardian Q
text: Survivor (Each of your Survivors has this creature's Survivor ability.) : Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

name: Glory Snow
text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
If your opponent has more cards in his mana zone than you have in yours, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone.

name: La Guile, Seeker of Skyfire

name: Le Quist, the Oracle

name: Snork La, Shrine Guardian
text:
Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

name: Syforce, Aurora Elemental
text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

text:
Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)

name: Pokolul
text: Whenever your opponent uses the "shield trigger" ability of a shield broken by this creature, you may untap this creature.

name: Sea Slug
text:
Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

name: Spikestrike Ichthys Q
text: Survivor (Each of your Survivors has this creature's Survivor ability.) : This creature can't be blocked.

name: Split-Head Hydroturtle Q
text: Survivor (Each of your Survivors has this creature's Survivor ability.) : Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw a card.

name: Steel-Turret Cluster
text: This creature can't be attacked by fire or nature creatures.

name: Gigakail

name: Gigaling Q

name: Gigazoul
text: While your opponent has no shields, this creature can't attack.

name: Horned Mutant
text: Each nature creature costs 1 more to summon, and each nature spell costs 1 more to cast.

name: Jewel Spider

name: Skullsweeper Q
text: Survivor (Each of your Survivors has this creature's Survivor ability.) : Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his hand.

name: Slime Veil
text: During your opponent's next turn, each of his creatures attacks if able.

name: Vashuna, Sword Dancer
text:
While your opponent has no shields, this creature can't attack.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
flavor: "Now, you shall see the ancient secrets of the East!"

name: Wisp Howler, Shadow of Tears
text: Nature and light slayer (Whenever this creature battles a nature or light creature, destroy the nature or light creature after the battle.)

name: Blazosaur Q
text: Survivor (Each of your Survivors has this creature's Survivor ability.) : Power attacker +1000 (While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power.)

name: Bombat, General of Speed

name: Cannoneer Bargon
text:
Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)
This creature can't attack players.

name: Cyclone Panic
text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Each player counts the cards in his hand, shuffles these cards into his deck, then draws that many cards.

name: Kip Chippotto
text: When one of your Armored Dragons would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.

name: Rikabu, the Dismantler
text: Speed attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)

name: Ruthless Skyterror
text:
This creature can attack untapped water creatures.
This creature can't attack players.
flavor: "If you don't kneel before my wrath, you'll certainly kneel after it."

name: Twin-Cannon Skyterror
text:
Speed attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

name: Ambush Scorpion
text:
Power attacker +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +3000 power.)

name: Balloonshroom Q
text: Survivor (Each of your Survivors has this creature's Survivor ability.) : When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.

name: Bloodwing Mantis
text:
Whenever this creature attacks, return 2 creatures from your mana zone to your hand.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

text: At the end of this turn, search your deck. For each of your opponent's shields your creatures broke this turn, you may take a creature from your deck, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
flavor: Kondu started to regret joining Wrugh's carpool.

name: Crow Winger
text: This creature gets +1000 power for each water creature and darkness creature your opponent has in the battle zone.

name: Enchanted Soil

name: Moon Horn
text:
This creature gets +1000 power for each water creature and darkness creature your opponent has in the battle zone.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
flavor: "Sometimes he'll go hog wild at a party and totally pig out. But he's usually such a boar." -Fear Fang

name: Nocturnal Giant
text:
This creature can't attack creatures.
Power attacker +7000 (While attacking, this creature gets +7000 power.)
Triple breaker (This creature breaks 3 shields.)

name: Scissor Scarab
text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Giant Insect from your deck, show that Giant Insect to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Smash Horn Q
text: Survivor (Each of your Survivors has this creature's Survivor ability.) : This creature gets +1000 power.
flavor: The symbol on its back is proof of its refusal to die.

name: Syrius, Firmament Elemental
text:
Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

name: King Tsunami
text:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, return all other creatures from the battle zone to their owners' hands.

name: Death Cruzer, the Annihilator
text:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your other creatures.
Triple breaker (This creature breaks 3 shields.)
flavor: Its only friend is the empty echo of death.

name: Billion-Degree Dragon
text: Triple breaker (This creature breaks 3 shields.)
flavor: The Megapocalypse woke it from its slumber deep within the molten core of the planet. It is the avenger of the world. It is legendary. And it is very, very cranky.

name: Avalanche Giant
text:
This creature can't attack creatures.
Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it breaks one of your opponent's shields.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
flavor: Its name is misleading. Mountains tremble in fear at the sight of it, and that causes avalanches. What it actually does to the mountains is much, much worse.

name: Invincible Aura
text: Add up to 3 cards from the top of your deck to your shields face down.
flavor: The Fire army has enough firepower to lay waste to a planet-but even that isn't enough to bring down the wall of Light.

name: Lu Gila, Silver Rift Guardian
text:
Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)
Evolution creatures are put into the battle zone tapped.

name: Aeropica
text: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its Tap ability. : Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

name: Invincible Technology
text: Search your deck. You may take any number of cards from your deck, show those cards to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Invincible Abyss

name: Tank Mutant
text: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its Tap ability. : Your opponent chooses one of his creatures in the battle zone and destroys it.

name: Invincible Cataclysm
text: Choose up to 3 of your opponent's shields and put them into his graveyard.

name: Valiant Warrior Exorious
text:
This creature can attack untapped creatures.
Power attacker +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +3000 power.)
flavor: "If you ever want to find me, just look between the explosions."

name: Invincible Unity
text: Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +8000 power and "triple breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "triple breaker" breaks 3 shields.)

name: Splinterclaw Wasp
text:
Power attacker +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +3000 power.)
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

name: Adomis, the Oracle
text: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its Tap ability. : Choose a shield and look at it. Then put it back where it was.

Evolution - Put on one of your Guardians.

name: Ballas, Vizier of Electrons

name: Bonds of Justice
text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)

Blocker

name: Chen Treg, Vizier of Blades

name: Cosmogold, Spectral Knight
text: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its Tap ability. : Return a spell from your mana zone to your hand.

name: Dava Torey, Seeker of Clouds
text: During your opponent's turn, if this creature would be discarded from your hand, put it into the battle zone instead.

name: Forbos, Sanctum Guardian Q
text: Survivor (Each of your Survivors has this creature's Survivor ability.) : When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a spell from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Gariel, Elemental of Sunbeams
text:
You can summon this creature only if you have cast a spell this turn.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

name: Kanesill, the Explorer

Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

name: Lightning Grass

name: Moontear, Spectral Knight
text: You can summon this creature only if you have cast a spell this turn.
flavor: All who see his sword undergo a change of heart. All who feel his sword undergo a change of intestines.

name: Protective Force
text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
One of your creatures in the battle zone that has "blocker" gets +4000 power until the end of the turn.

name: Rain of Arrows
text: Look at your opponent's hand. He discards all darkness spells from it.

name: Razorpine Tree
text: This creature gets +2000 power for each shield you have.

name: Sphere of Wonder
text: If your opponent has more shields than you do, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

Blocker
